    • Method Detail

      • getTranslation

        java.lang.String getTranslation(java.lang.String message)
        Get translation for the current language of message. If the translation not found return the message it self.
        Parameters:
        message - the message key used for translation.
        Returns:
        the traslated message

      • getTranslation

        java.lang.String getTranslation(java.lang.String message,
                                java.lang.String[] args)
        Get translation for the current language of message. This use the java MessageFormat utiity to replace args in the resulting translation message. If the translation not found return the message it self.
        Parameters:
        message - the message key used for translation.
        args -
        Returns:
        the traslated message

      • addResourceFamily

        void addResourceFamily(java.lang.String family,
                       java.lang.ClassLoader loader,
                       java.lang.String callerName)

      • addResourceFamily

        void addResourceFamily(java.lang.String family,
                       java.io.File folder)
        Adds an additional family of resource files containing some translations. The search path to locate the files is provided by the dir parameter. Example: i18nManager.addResourceFamily("text", new File("./resources"))
        Parameters:
        family - The family name (or base name) which is used to search actual properties files.
        folder - The search path to locate the property files

      • getPreferredLocales

        java.util.List<java.util.Locale> getPreferredLocales()

        java.util.Locale getCurrentLocale()
